import datetime

from django.utils.functional import cached_property
from rest_framework import serializers

from client.models.credit import Credit
from client.models.credit_certificate import (
    CreditCertificate,
    CreditCertificateEnclosure,
    ReviewLog
)
from client.models.user import S1User
from consts.common import (
    CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT,
    DATE_FORMAT,
    FEN_TO_YUAN
)
from utils.drf.fields import FenToYuanFloatField, ChineseYuanFloatField



[文档]class CreditSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    授信信息序列器
    """
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='capital_company.name', read_only=True)
    quota = FenToYuanFloatField(read_only=True)
    quota_available = FenToYuanFloatField(source='available_quota', read_only=True)
    quota_available_cn = ChineseYuanFloatField(source='available_quota', read_only=True)


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = Credit
        fields = ('id', 'credit_number', 'capital_company', 'quota', 'end',
                  'financing_annualized_interest_rate', 'quota_available', 'quota_available_cn', 'punishment_rate')

    promise_pay_at = serializers.DateField(write_only=True)

        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('id', 'credit_id', 'company_id', 'time_limit_id', 'amount', 'promise_pay_at')
        read_only_fields = ('id', )

        child=serializers.JSONField(),

    )

[文档]class CapitalOpenApprovalListSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """资金机构开立审批列表"""
    from_company = serializers.CharField(source='from_company.name', default='')
    company = serializers.CharField(source='company.name')
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    created_at = serializers.DateTimeField(format=DATE_FORMAT)
    s1_user = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_s1_user(self, obj: CreditCertificate):
        """获取账户名"""
        user_obj: S1User = S1User.objects.using('credible_data').filter(id=obj.s1_user_id).first()
        return user_obj.username



[文档]    class Meta:
        """元数据"""
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = (
            'id', 'number', 'from_company', 'company', 
            'amount', 'created_at', 'promise_pay_at', 's1_user',
        )




[文档]class CapitalOpenApprovalDetailNestedSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """内嵌序列器: 获取信用凭证相关信息"""
    company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source='company.credit_code')
    company = serializers.CharField(source='company.name')
    from_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source='from_company.credit_code')
    from_company = serializers.CharField(source='from_company.name')
    capital_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source='credit.capital_company.credit_code')
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='credit.capital_company.name')
    created_at = serializers.DateTimeField(format=DATE_FORMAT)
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.DecimalField(source='credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate', max_digits=5, decimal_places=2)
    credit_certificate_receive_time_limit = serializers.CharField(source='credit_certificate_receive_time_limit.name')
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source='credit.credit_number')
    start = serializers.DateField(source='credit.start')
    end = serializers.DateField(source='credit.end')
    total_contract_amount = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    enclosures = serializers.SerializerMethodField()



[文档]    class Meta:
        """元数据"""
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = (
            'id', 'company_credit_code', 'company', 'from_company_credit_code', 'from_company',
            'number', 'capital_company_credit_code', 'capital_company', 'promise_pay_at', 
            'created_at', 'amount', 'financing_annualized_interest_rate', 'credit_certificate_receive_time_limit',
            'credit_number', 'start', 'end', 'total_contract_amount', 
            'enclosures'
        )



[文档]    def to_representation(self, instance):
        self._obj: CreditCertificate = instance
        for attr in ('cached_enclosures',):
            if hasattr(self, attr):
                delattr(self, attr)
        return super().to_representation(instance)


    @cached_property
    def cached_enclosures(self):
        """缓存附件"""
        return CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.filter(
            credit_certificate_id=self._obj.pk
        ).only(
            'contract_no', 'contract_amount', 'contract_enclosure',
            'contract_sign_at', 'invoice_enclosure', 'other_enclosure'
        )
    

[文档]    def get_enclosures(self, instance):
        """获取附件"""
        return CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(self.cached_enclosures, many=True).data



[文档]    def get_total_contract_amount(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """获取累计合同金额"""
        total_amount = 0
        if self.cached_enclosures:
            total_amount = sum(map(lambda x: x.contract_amount, self.cached_enclosures))
        return "%.2f" % (total_amount / FEN_TO_YUAN)

        """获取工作流"""
        return instance.get_work_flow()



[文档]    def get_object(self, instance):
        """获取审批详情信息"""
        return CapitalOpenApprovalDetailNestedSerializer(instance).data



[文档]    class Meta:
        """元数据"""
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('work_flow', 'object',)




[文档]class CreditCertificateNestedSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    内嵌序列器：
        - 获取信用凭证基本信息
    """
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    deadline_close = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_deadline_close(self, instance):
        today = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        if (instance.promise_pay_at - today).days <= CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT:
            return True
        return False



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('id', 'number', 'deadline_close', 'review_status', 'amount', 'is_valid')
        read_only_fields = ('id', )




[文档]class CreditCertificateBasicInfoNestedSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    内嵌序列器：
        - 获取信用凭证相关信息
    """
    # 原始开立
    open_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")
    open_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.credit_code")

    # 接收
    company = serializers.CharField(source="company.name")
    company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source="company.credit_code")

    # 开立详情，转让企业为空
    from_company = serializers.SerializerMethodField(method_name="get_empty_name")
    from_company_credit_code = serializers.SerializerMethodField(method_name="get_empty_name")

    # 资金机构
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")
    capital_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.credit_code")

    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.FloatField(source="credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate")
    time_limit = serializers.CharField(source="credit_certificate_receive_time_limit.name")
    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="credit.credit_number")
    start = serializers.CharField(source="credit.start")
    end = serializers.CharField(source="credit.end")

    receive_at = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_empty_name(self, instance):
        return ""



[文档]    def get_receive_at(self, instance):
        """
        计算【接收日期】：
            - 开立或者是转让整个流程走完，接收者开始持有的时间点
        """
        if hasattr(instance, "creditcurrentnode"):
            current_node = instance.creditcurrentnode.work_flow.code
            if current_node == "open_hold" or current_node == "transfer_complete":
                return serializers.DateField().to_representation(instance.creditcurrentnode.updated_at.date())
        return None



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('open_company', 'open_company_credit_code', 'company', 'company_credit_code',
                  'from_company', 'from_company_credit_code', 'capital_company', 'capital_company_credit_code',
                  'amount', 'financing_annualized_interest_rate', 'receive_at', 'promise_pay_at', 'time_limit',
                  'credit_number', 'start', 'end')
        read_only_fields = ('id', )

    内嵌序列器：
        - 获取驳回审批相关信息

[文档]    class Meta:
        model = ReviewLog
        fields = ('opinion', 'reject_at', 'reject_node',)
        read_only_fields = fields




[文档]class CreditCertificateDetailSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    开立信用凭证的详情信息：
        - 凭证基本信息
        - 信用凭证相关信息
        - 驳回审批相关信息
    """
    credit_certificate = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    basic_info = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    enclosures = CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(source='credit_certificate_enclosures', many=True)
    reject_info = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_credit_certificate(self, instance):
        return CreditCertificateNestedSerializer(instance).data



[文档]    def get_basic_info(self, instance):
        return CreditCertificateBasicInfoNestedSerializer(instance).data



[文档]    def get_reject_info(self, instance):
        if instance.review_status == "reject":
            last_reject_review_log = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table="credit_certificate",
                data_id=instance.id,
                result="reject",
            ).order_by('created_at').last()
            return CreditCertificateRejectInfoNestedSerializer(last_reject_review_log).data
        else:
            return None



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('credit_certificate', 'basic_info', 'enclosures', 'reject_info', )
        read_only_fields = ('id', )
